cause.description:
1. Provide Support Through Monetary Donations to the Middle Eastern Countries
2. Give What We Have to Others That Do Not
3. Spread the Love Amongst Middle Eastern Countries
4. Find Alternative Ways to Solve Foreign Policy Problems and Dilemas
5. Discuss What We Believe In or About the Middle East and Its Conflicts
1. Provide Better Health Care to the Middle East
2. Provide Shelters
3. Provide Clothing
4. Provide Food
5. Fix Roads
6. Fix Buildings
7. Stop the War(s)
8. Allow for a 6 Month Period of U.S. Troop Withdrawl
9. Provide New International Borders
10. Create a World for Democracy and Peace
cause.mission: Promote Peace, Love, and Unity Among the Middle Eastern Countries
cause.name: Peace: In the Middle East
